content.rendered: Community and technical colleges are a crucial talent supply pipeline in today’s economy—and are bound to become even more important as employment patterns shift post COVID-19. This panel will explore how employers and two-year institution leaders can partner effectively to deliver opportunities to all students. We’ll explore trends in the COVID-era and how we expect them to continue to shift, along with opportunities to bring more jobs to recent graduates.

excerpt.rendered: A conversation with Union Pacific & Northern Essex Community College
